column3: I'd feel more comfortable if all the individual commits were backported instead of a effectively squashed version without reference to the original commits

> I'd feel more comfortable if all the individual commits were backported instead of a effectively squashed version without reference to the original commits\n\nThere aren't really any individual commits *to* backport.
